textos_fuente.text: Celebration Golf Club ⛳️ Book Golf Online • golfscape™ Explore Destinations Help Log In Sign Up Language Currency How can we help? How can I book a tee time? 1 Navigate to your preferred golf course. Select your date of play, tee time, rentals, and number of players – and then click Book. You will receive an instant email confirmation and your tee time will be guaranteed at the course. Can I modify or cancel a booking? 1 Absolutely! If you are within the cancellation policy of your tee time, navigate to the Manage Booking page to modify or cancel your booking. What is your cancellation policy? 1 You can typically cancel your booking for a full refund within 48 hours of your tee time, but this may vary slightly by course. Cancellation policies are defined by each golf course and are clearly marked during the entire booking process as well as in your email confirmation. Why should I book with golfscape? 1 We are the only service who’s technology operates at all our partner courses – that means tee times and rates on golfscape are sourced directly. So when you make a booking, your reservation is confirmed instantly at the golf course. How can I get more help? 1 You may communicate with us anytime using the button below or email us at [email protected] – we’re happy to help! Contact us Get Started Create Account or sign up with Log In Forgot Password? Log In or log in with Profile My Bookings Log Out Orlando Golf Courses Celebration Golf Club Celebration Golf Club Orlando Golf Courses Next Previous Show all photos Instant Booking Confirmation Trusted by 1M+ Golfers Free Changes & Cancellations Opened in 1996, Celebration Golf Club is the final collaboration between Robert Trent Jones Senior and Junior. From the onset, their belief was that “every hole should be a hard par and an easy bogey.” Using their joint design strategies and the natural lay of the land, they crafted an upscale daily-fee golf resort that takes full advantage of read more Course Details 18 Holes Par 72 7023 yards Established in 1996 Unique Course Type Bermuda Designed by Robert Trent Jones, Sr. Club Facilities 62.check Caddy / Golf Carts 62.check Practice Facilities 62.check Lessons 62.check Dining 62.check Club / Shoe Rental 62.check Locker Room 62.check Golf Shop Weather Today's condition: - Website designed by Par Six Golf Media Manage Consent To provide the best experiences, we use technologies like cookies to store and/or access device information. Consenting to these technologies will allow us to process data such as browsing behavior or unique IDs on this site. Not consenting or withdrawing consent, may adversely affect certain features and functions. Functional Functional Always active The technical storage or access is strictly necessary for the legitimate purpose of enabling the use of a specific service explicitly requested by the subscriber or user, or for the sole purpose of carrying out the transmission of a communication over an electronic communications network. Preferences Preferences The technical storage or access is necessary for the legitimate purpose of storing preferences that are not requested by the subscriber or user. Statistics Statistics The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for statistical purposes. The technical storage or access that is used exclusively for anonymous statistical purposes. Without a subpoena, voluntary compliance on the part of your Internet Service Provider, or additional records from a third party, information stored or retrieved for this purpose alone cannot usually be used to identify you. Marketing Marketing The technical storage or access is required to create user profiles to send advertising, or to track the user on a website or across several websites for similar marketing purposes. Our team will be available daily from dawn to dusk to assist with your reservation. Thank you for your patience and understanding! About Us | Eastwood Golf Club Follow us: Call: (03) 9728 2944 Contact Home Golf Our Course Public Bookings Get Into Golf Womens Golf Juniors Golf Seniors Golf Corporate Events Dress Code Etiquette & Course Care Local Rules Golf Shop Shop Meet The Team Lessons & Coaching Practice Facilities Membership Membership Information Benefits of Being a Member Payment Options Reciprocal Clubs Pennant Team Functions & Dining Weddings Functions Dining Corporate Events Lawn Bowls General Information Community Special Events Pennant Bowls Sponsors News About Us About Us History Sponsors Contact/Directions Board of Directors News/Upcoming Events PUBLIC BOOKINGS MEMBERS About Us Home About Us Club Profile Eastwood Golf Club is set on 48 picturesque hectares along Liverpool Road, Kilsyth. Our renowned 18-hole golf course is widely regarded as the leading clay-belt course in Melbourne’s East, offering a rewarding challenge for golfers of all abilities. Membership enquiries are always welcome. Beyond golf, Eastwood offers a wide range of facilities, including two bowling greens , a spacious function room, bistro dining, Members Lounge and ATM facilities—all within a smoke-free, friendly and relaxed environment. With panoramic views and beautifully maintained gardens, Eastwood provides the perfect setting for any occasion. Whether you’re planning a private celebration, a corporate golf day, or simply a great day out on the course, our function room is an outstanding choice. To support your game, we also provide a fully equipped golf shop , along with professional golf tuition to help you improve and enjoy your golf even more. Money Smart Problem Gambling Eastwood Golf Club Commitment Letter for Golf Australia’s vision 2025 DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct - Vietnamese DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct - Turkish DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct - Arabic DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct - Chinese DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct - Spanish DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct - Greek DOWNLOAD Eastwood Golf Club Code of Conduct - Italian DOWNLOAD ACKNOWLEDGEMENT OF COUNTRY Members and Staff of Eastwood Golf Club would like to acknowledge the Wurundjeri People of the Kulin Nation, the Traditional Owners and custodians of the land in which we play, gather and work. We pay respect to Elders past, present and emerging and recognise their connection to the land. Tree sculpture Thanks to some creative thinking, Eastwood Golf Club now boasts one of the most distinctive natural landmarks of any course in Australia. Adjacent to the 1st tee stood a large Cypress tree that posed a safety risk due to its condition and was earmarked to be removed. However, rather than electing for full removal, the Club recognised an opportunity and instead opted to turn the surviving trunk into a unique work of art. With the assistance of sponsorship from two members, Mike Rawlinson and Roger Earle, the Club commissioned renowned chainsaw sculptor Rob Bast to create a wood carving with the intention of becoming a feature landmark at the course. The design features a golfer with golf bag and clubs, accompanied by birdlife. The project commenced in March 2015 and took two weeks to complete. “The sculpture is simply stunning. Rob did an amazing job and exceeded all our expectations. The skill and level of detail that has gone into the work and what he was able to achieve using chainsaws as his tools is quite incredible,” he comments. “We always thought our course here at Eastwood was special, but we now have a landmark that is truly unique. It has become a major talking point amongst members and guests. Everyone who comes here makes comment on it and usually stop to take photos at the first tee.” contact MEMBERS Quick Links Golf Shop Membership Functions & Dining Lawn Bowls About Us Areas We Serve Eastwood Golf Club Liverpool Rd, Kilsyth 3137 Email admin@eastwoodgolf.com.au Phone (03) 9728 2944 Course Hours Mon to Tue: 07:00am - 05:00pm Wed to Sun: 07:00am - 06:00pm Follow us: Bistro Hours Lunch: Tuesday – Sunday : 11.00am – 2.00pm Dinner: Thursday, Friday : 5.30pm – 9.00pm © Copyright 2025, Eastwood Golf Club | All Rights Reserved | Terms & Conditions |

Course Overview - Celebration Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to footer Facebook Twitter Instagram FL ELITE CARD RESERVATIONS Online Store Celebration Golf Club Tee Times Public Tee Times FL Elite Card Reservations Rental Clubs Course Course Overview Accolades Driving Range Instruction Golf Academy Weekly Adult Golf Clinic Junior Academy After School Camp Creation Kids –  After School Camp 2025 Free Fitting Friday FL Elite Card Florida Elite Card 2025 Florida Elite Golf Card – Renewal 2025 Florida Elite Golf Card- New Member Florida Elite FAQ FL Elite Application Hosting Weddings & Events Group Golf Events Group Golf Rentals Pro Shop Restaurant Contact Us Contact Us Email Club Employment Opportunities Course Overview Celebration Golf Club, nestled in the heart of Central Florida, is a golfing gem that embodies the essence of the Sunshine State. Located conveniently near Orlando’s world-famous attractions such as Disney World Resort, Sea World, Universal Studios, and The Orlando International Airport, this course is a true haven for both locals and tourists alike. Its meticulously designed layout, often echoing the mantra of “every hole should be a hard par and an easy bogey” challenges golfers of all skill levels. The course boasts Champion Dwarf Bermuda greens, renowned for the pristine quality, ensuring a superb putting experience. With a rich history of hosting events, Celebration Golf Club is not just a golf course; it’s a destination where the love for golf meets the allure of Florida’s vibrant hospitality and entertainment offerings. Rules of Etiquette: Non-metal spikes required Repair ball marks on greens, and fill all divots with mix. rake all sand bunkers Each group is expected to complete play within the 4-hour 30-minute time limit or may be asked to suspend play. Please keep up with the group in front of you at all times. Proper golf attire is required at all times Download Scorecard Footer About Us Located within the Orlando golf resort area, Celebration Golf Club delivers a golfing experience that can challenge the pros and yet offer a rewarding time for juniors and those just learning the game. Come enjoy one of Orlando’s premier golf facilities. Florida Elite FAQ - Celebration Golf Club Skip to primary navigation Skip to main content Skip to footer Facebook Twitter Instagram FL ELITE CARD RESERVATIONS Online Store Celebration Golf Club Tee Times Public Tee Times FL Elite Card Reservations Rental Clubs Course Course Overview Accolades Driving Range Instruction Golf Academy Weekly Adult Golf Clinic Junior Academy After School Camp Creation Kids –  After School Camp 2025 Free Fitting Friday FL Elite Card Florida Elite Card 2025 Florida Elite Golf Card – Renewal 2025 Florida Elite Golf Card- New Member Florida Elite FAQ FL Elite Application Hosting Weddings & Events Group Golf Events Group Golf Rentals Pro Shop Restaurant Contact Us Contact Us Email Club Employment Opportunities Florida Elite FAQ What’s new for this year vs. last year? You will be issued a member ID card shortly into the new year that will also serve as your range card (OCN only for range portion) and to store your redeemed points. Points are still earned per dollar spent and will be transferred to member ID card to be redeemed. The booking window to receive cardholder rates has been extended to 14 days from 10. Who can purchase the card? The Florida Elite Golf Card is available to purchase for all Florida Residents with a Florida driver’s license or a Celebration Town I.D. card. What proof of residency can I show? You can show your Florida driver’s license or Celebration Town I.D. card What are Loyalty Points? Cardholders earn 1 loyalty point for each dollar spent as a cardholder. Points are valid towards purchases at the golf club at which they were earned. Each point is worth $0.10. Make sure to alert staff that you are cardholder when making a purchases to earn points. What happens to my loyalty points that I earned in 2024? Points will be valid for use until January 31 st , 2025. If you have renewed by January 31 st , 2025, the points will remain in your account. Must be active cardholder to use points. How do I book a round of golf online? Tee time reservations may be booked by selecting the “FL Elite Card Reservations” tab at the top of the home page. You can login using your existing Golfnow profile login (as long as it is the same email used on your FL Elite application) or sign up for a new account. The email address used must match the email entered on your FL Elite Golf Card application. Once logged in, select the desired course by using the green flag icon, to view available tee times. How do I redeem my complimentary round? Your complimentary round may be redeemed within the guidelines and restrictions listed on the voucher you receive. This round is no longer associated with birthdays. How do I use my ‘Member for a Day’ voucher at Tuscawilla Country Club? Restrictions and fees apply. You can contact the Tuscawilla golf shop at 407-366-1851, and they will provide you with tee time availability, voucher restrictions, and fees. Make sure to have your voucher with you when you check in for golf. What and where is the “Tooth” course? The Tooth Course is a 9-hole walking course at Orange County National consisting of par 3’s and 4’s.  Greens fees for card holders are $10.00 and guests are $20.00. Golf carts are not available in 2024. Push carts are available for rent. You may book a round at the Tooth course through the FL Elite Golf Card reservation portal.  Lunch or warm up range balls are NOT included with Tooth rounds. How do guest rounds work? Cardholders can host up to (3) guests at 15% off their applicable FL Resident or Non-FL Resident rate. Lunch and range balls are NOT included with guest rounds. Who do I contact for assistance with my card? Any of our Golf Shop Professionals will be glad to assist you with any needs you may have.  You may contact us by calling 407-566-4653 ext 4608 (Celebration) or 407-656-2626 ext 2210.  You may also email us at proshop@celebrationgolf.com or proshop@ocngolf.com Footer About Us Located within the Orlando golf resort area, Celebration Golf Club delivers a golfing experience that can challenge the pros and yet offer a rewarding time for juniors and those just learning the game. Come enjoy one of Orlando’s premier golf facilities. Our course offers a turnkey solution for all your tournament and golf outing needs. With meticulous attention to detail, we ensure that your golf event is executed flawlessly, from start to finish. Our location, just a stone’s throw away from Walt Disney World, provides not only convenience but also a picturesque backdrop for your tournament. Whether you’re organizing a corporate outing or a charity fundraiser, our experienced team will work closely with you to customize every aspect, from tee times to catering, to create an unforgettable golfing experience for your participants, or you’re looking to have a day of “no-frills” fun golf, a convention/corporate tournament, or an officially sanctioned 54-hole national championship, trust us to make your tournament a hole-in-one success. We are happy to offer you our five-star tournament services including : Full-time professional Golf Event Manager A special committee, planning, and practice round rates available Plush red carpeting from bag drop to registration “Meet & Greet” for bus transportation at hotel by dedicated event staff Printed scorecards and rules sheets (Customized) Shuttle service to and from practice range On-course skirted tables and chairs (as available) On-course food and beverage stations Golf Academy clinics and exhibitions Set up of all on-course contests and skill events Private indoor or outdoor food and beverage facilities Please fill out an information request or direct any additional questions to Jeff Magruder Sales & Revenue Manager jmagruder@celebrationgolf.com 407-566-4653 ext. 4621 Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. We value positivity, flexibility, and a commitment to guest satisfaction as key attributes in our candidates. If you have a passion for delivering first-class service and want to be part of a dynamic team in a beautiful golf course setting, we encourage you to explore our open positions. Whether you’re interested in hospitality, maintenance, or any other aspect of golf course operations, Celebration Golf Club is dedicated to providing a rewarding work environment where you can contribute to creating memorable experiences for our guests while immersing yourself in the golf industry. Here at Celebration Golf Club, we are looking for employees to be: Be friendly and helpful in serving our guests Maintain a positive attitude Maintain an appropriate, clean, and presentable personal appearance at all times Have reliable transportation to and from work Arrive promptly for your scheduled shift Be flexible in the hours/days you will work Be flexible and cooperative in the work you are asked to perform Be safety conscious and obey all safety rules and policies Be willing to “go the extra mile”, both for your guests and your co-workers Take pride in the company, the facility, and your work Please enable JavaScript in your browser to complete this form. Pro Shop Find the perfect gift for yourself or the golfer in your life. Welcome to Celebration Golf Club – Orlando Golf! At Celebration Golf Club it’s all about you! Since opening for play in 1996, Orlando golf hasn’t been the same. We believe there is a difference between “playing” a golf course and “experiencing” the game of golf on a course that was inspired by its Old World legacy. Welcome to Celebration Golf Club, one of Orlando’s premier golf facilities. It’s here that you’ll do more than play a course—you’ll feel what it’s like to play the final course co-designed by the renowned masters of golf course architecture, Robert Trent Jones Senior and Junior. In designing Celebration Golf Club an Orlando golf course, their combined talents created a course unlike any other in the nation. It’s lush, almost like a natural park with undulating swells and topography, a course reflective of the very best of every course they have created around the world. IT’S YOUR SHOT! GRAB YOUR CLUBS & GET OVER TO THE GOLF COURSE. Courses for Women Why our Guests Love to Golf at Celebration: Sept 20, 2023 ★★★★★ “Very pleased with the experience at this course. The course was in great shape and the tee time included lunch that was solid. Layout is fun, staff are friendly, and merchandise is well-priced. For those looking for a course to play on a Disney trip away from the Disney courses, this is a fantastic option. ”          – Kurtis H. Sept 20, 2023  ★★★★★ “I had organized a round of golf for 28 players at celebration this week. We sent them the information about all our players and their starting times and all the golf carts and staff were there to help us. The golf course is in great shape it’s a great place to play and the staff is just above and beyond what you would expect.”   – Armand M. October 12, 2023 ★★★★★ “Top notch golf course. The staff was so friendly and helpful. Went for a golf outing and it was put so well together. I recommend this place beyond many others in the area. The course was fantastic, tough holes and a lot of water and trees. The greens were true and fast. I cant wait to get down there again and play!”  – Kyle M. Katrin Craft October 3, 2023 ★★★★★ “If you are in the Orlando area for business or pleasure, this course is a must play course. From the dropping off of your clubs, to check in, Range and Starter (especially Paul from Las Vegas) , this place is first class. The course was a bit wet after getting 3-5 inches of rain the weekend before. So it was cart paths only. That was the only negative the whole round. The greens were immaculate and fairways and tee boxes were lush. A must play course in Orlando.”    – Paul L. October 4, 2023 ★★★★★ “My wife and I played Celebration GC for the 3rd time and we both agree that this is one of our favorite courses to play. We try to play a different course in Central  Florida each week. The course is challenging, in excellent condition with quick greens and good fairways. The staff was very friendly and make us feel welcomed We will be back.”       – Paul P. You can feel it on the course and you can see it in the clubhouse, Golf shop, and restaurant. Every employee has a personal mission to provide you and your guests with the very best experience at Celebration Golf Club. Whether it is a round of golf, a corporate tournament, a banquet, or a wedding, we strive to make it outstanding. The only way to do that is to pay attention to you and the smallest details surrounding your tee time, golf lesson, wedding, or tournament. We want to make Celebration Golf Club a destination of choice, and to achieve that we promise to earn your loyalty one visit at a time.
